name: PepaFatal
description:
PepaFatal (Gamejam Game) Quick game we did for the STAYSAFEJAM. Game was created in 48 hours.

In PepaFatal! you play as Pepa the toilet paper. Trying to survive the endless panic buying from several hands trying to grab you. Dodge hands, obstacles by rolling and jumping.

Refresh your rollings by collecting other toilet paper.

Controls KeyDescriptionW, Space, UpJumpA, Left
Switch lane leftD, RightSwitch lane rightS, Down, ShiftRoll Credits

Felix Borns - Rigging, Animation, Sound
Johannes Grewer - 3D Modeling, Texturing, Concept
Sebastian Krause - Programming, Implementation, Concept
